Welcome. 

In this workshop we will 

How do these goals represent your country? There are two ways we will look into this. First, at a conceptual level, we will discuss whether the philosophies behind the goals represent what is important to your country.

Second, we will look at the data that are included in the goal models. This question has two parts. A) Is the model itself a good representation, based on the available global datasets (ie with data mostly available for each country)? B) Are data available for Samoa, or is this information gapfilled?
